attributes.action: Force labour to hold local elections in May 2025, prevent them delaying it
attributes.additional_details: Because the electorate are desperate for change now and need to send this message to the government ASAP
attributes.background: I do not want labour to delay local elections for 12 months

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Do not postpone the local elections
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710155
